mapper.select: SELECT board_seq AS boardSeq, writer, content, target_id AS targetId, ref_group AS refGroup, comment_group commentGroup, regdate FROM board_comment WHERE ref_group=#{boardSeq} ORDER BY commentGroup ASC, boardSeq ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boardComment (board_seq, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, regdate) VALUES(#{boardSeq}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{targetId}, #{refGroup}, #{commentGroup}, SYSDATE)
